code: import React from"react";import{connect}from"react-redux";import s from"./MainForms.module.css";import LoginReduxForm from"./LoginForm";import{loginThunkCreator,setAuthData}from"../../../redux/auth-reducer";var LoginFormContainer=function LoginFormContainer(props){var onSubmit=function onSubmit(state){props.loginThunkCreator(state);};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:s.mainLogin+" "+s.componentsItem},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(LoginReduxForm,{onSubmit:onSubmit,className:s.mainLogin+" "+s.componentsItem}));};var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{isAuth:state.auth.isAuth};};export default connect(mapStateToProps,{setAuthData:setAuthData,loginThunkCreator:loginThunkCreator})(LoginFormContainer);
